translations: v．倾听，留心听：集中注意力去听某个声音。
· He harks to the sound of the approaching footsteps.
他专心倾听着逼近的脚步声。

sentences.sentence: It harks back to the concept of quality over quantity.
sentences.translation: 这就回到了质量胜于数量的理念上来。

sentences.sentence: This harks back to something I  we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao ioned in my first tip.
sentences.translation: 这又重提了我在第一点里说到的。

sentences.sentence: Some of these examples harks back to the article on RESTBucks.
sentences.translation: 其中一些例子可以从RESTBucks的文章里找到。
